tool_description: Natural Language Actions API: Zappier Playground for Through Testing
name: Natural Language Actions API: Zappier Playground
title: Natural Language Actions API: Zappier Playground
tool_name: Natural Language Actions API: Zappier Playground

api_list.name: get_configuration_link
api_list.description: Provides a link to configure more actions. Alternatively, searching through apps and actions will provide more specific configuration links.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-language-actions-api-zappier-playground.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/configuration-link/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-language-actions-api-zappier-playground.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_execution_log_endpoint
api_list.description: Get the execution log for a given execution log id.

schema.description: This is a summary of the results given the action that was executed.

action_used.description: The name of the action that was executed.
action_used.title: Action Used

additional_results.description: The rest of the full results. Always returns an array of objects
additional_results.title: Additional Results

assistant_hint.description: A hint for the assistant on what to do next.
assistant_hint.title: Assistant Hint

error.description: The error message if the execution failed.
error.title: Error

id.description: The id of the execution log.
id.title: Id

input_params.description: The params we used / will use to execute the action.
input_params.title: Input Params

result.description: A trimmed down result of the first item of the full results. Ideal for humans and language models!
result.title: Result

result_field_labels.description: Human readable labels for some of the keys in the result.
result_field_labels.title: Result Field Labels

review_url.description: The URL to run the action or review the AI choices the AI made for input_params given instructions.
review_url.title: Review Url

schema.title: ExecuteResponse

api_list.name: list_exposed_actions
api_list.description: List all the currently exposed actions for the given account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://natural-language-actions-api-zappier-playground.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/exposed/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "natural-language-actions-api-zappier-playground.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

configuration_link.description: URL to configure and expose more actions.
configuration_link.title: Configuration Link

id.description: The unique ID of the exposed action.
id.title: Id

operation_id.description: The operation ID of the exposed action.
operation_id.title: Operation Id

params.description: Available hint fields for the action.
params.title: Params
